name: Sacrifice Dungeon (itch) (Rixud)
description:
Description

- Random Mazes
- Sacrifice life points to empower yourself (Spell Book & Statue)
- Chest reward life points
- Kill Skulls give life points 

 Controls: 
- Move WASD / Arrows
- Look Around : Mouse
- Cast FireBall : Mouse Left CLick
- Reset Maze Generation : R (use this when you get a maze with no exit)

 Tools:

- Unity 2017
- Visual Studio 

https://twitter.com/Rixud
Follow me, and give me some advice / feedback
